docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Hi Mike Hey nice - now let's start writing some documentation!
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.title: Hi Mike

docs.text: MkDocs Static site generator used to build the MyDocs documentation site. Deploy to GH Pages mkdocs gh-deploy Develop Your Site mkdocs serve Then open http://127.0.0.1:8000/ to see a live preview of your site. Create a New Documentation Project mkdocs new my-project cd my-project
